entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Key Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 AM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Key Lake Airport 1:29 PM CST Monday 13 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.1°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -10.4°C
Wind: ENE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 14.
